features: 🌿 Why Pyunkang Yul? - Along with know-how recipe of Pyunkang Yul Eastern Medicine Clinic, specialized in helping skin and respiratory diseases for about 50 years, the toner helps calm angry skin comfortably by carefully selected ingredients found in nature and rigorous testing

🌿 No Harmful Substances - It has a mild, low pH formulation similar to that of smooth healthy skin and has completed skin irritation test with zero-irritation result; 20 kinds of harmful ingredients are not added; in addition, all ingredients are in EWG safety grade

🌿 Perfect for Irritated and Sensitive Skin Types - Through Centella Asiatica extract (also called as Cica or Madecassoside), Tea Tree and Lonicera Japonica Flower Extract, known as a representative soothing ingredient, that quickly calms angry skin in a healthy way and controls excess sebum also moisturizes irritated skin without worrying about irritation

🌿 Strong Moisturizing - 2 types of Peptides give strong moisturizing power to sensitive and tired skin from external stimuli, leaving the skin revived. Panthenol and 5 Hyaluronic Acids attract moisture up to 1000 times its weight, providing a deep hydrating feeling by quickly supplying moisture to dry skin. A minute particle of Squalene does not clog pores, gives a strong moisturizing power to skin and rich vitamins and nutrition included in Shea Butter vitalizes the skin from external stimuli

🌿 Tested and Certified - Pyunkang Yul has eliminated all the scents, colors, and unnecessary ingredients that may cause skin irritation. Only carefully selected healthy ingredients are put into the product through rigorous testing and certification.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great thicker moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the cream version of this product for the past month as my daily morning moisturizer for the warmer weather. I prefer to use a heavier product at night and thought I would give this a try. It's perfect--it's just heavy enough for the warm weather, there is no scent, and it is soothing for my skin and has not caused any breakouts. This balm version comes with less product than the cream, only 30ml with this balm vs the 50ml with the cream. For me, the price and size of the product is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I found my holy grail moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I'm so impressed with this brand, especially at such a good price point. I got the cream and the toner from this line and both are everything I could've asked for. The cream does come in a pretty tiny jar but that's not false advertising or anything, I just have no concept of size. It's deeply moisturizing and does leave a glowy sheen for a few minutes until it fully sinks in, but I swear my skin feels so bouncy and nourished all day. I use this more as a night creak because it is so nourishing and I live in a very hot climate. I find that if I wear this during the day in the heat I'll start sweating it off and I can actually feel the occlusive ingredients in my sweat- like my sweat will take on the consistency of a hydrating toner. That's pretty neat because I get a tangible idea of just how hydrating this stuff is, but I kinda need it to stay on my skin. So yeah, nighttime/winter cream for sure. That said, it doesn't feel at ALL heavy or greasy. The formulation is super luxurious for how cheap it is. I can also say the cica in here really makes a difference as I am a trans man and my beard is coming in for the first time, so I'm dealing with some pretty gnarly beard itch. This calms it right down.The toner is also wonderful but it's a very light watery consistency and I find I have to cup my hands together and splash my face with it and then really tap it in to get the most out of it. You can use a cotton pad to swipe it over the skin but it's so thin that it soaks into the pad really fast and I feel like I'm wasting product.Sorry about the long review but I love these products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice simple moisturizer.
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a good simple moisturizer, this is a good one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good and affordable
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive and dry skin right now due to retinol and other actives. Normally, when I’m experiencing flareups like this, I would use La Roche Posay's Cicaplast Baume, but it wasn’t available anywhere for a while, so I just ordered a different cica balm instead and I’m so glad I did. This balm is buttery soft unlike Cicaplast and doesn’t have to be warmed up before applying. It just melts into my skin and feels non-greasy. There’s no added fragrance but it’s not scent-free. It smells a bit industrial actually. The balm contains a lot of healing, calming properties, but the tea tree oil may not be suitable for ultra sensitive skin and around the eyes. The packaging is ok. I prefer a tube or air tight containers, but since it’s small, I’ll just finish it before it gets too oxidized. Overall, it’s a very good moisturizer when combined with hydrating toner and serum. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and Hydrating
reviews.reviewText: This is the lightest moisturizer I’ve used. I apply it over a strong and acid Vitamin C serum and it sinks it. It’s perfectly hydrating, not even a little heavy, and not sticky or greasy.This is perfection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for combination skin
reviews.reviewText: This is good for summer or to use as a night moisturizer but definitely not for colder months. I tried putting on hylauronic acid, conditioning milk and vitamin c before applying this to see if it’d help retain the moisture but it didn’t :( My chin and around the nose got dry within 4 hours even though I wasn’t outside even though I tried applying primer 10 mins after before putting on my cicapair and some concealer.It feels similar to a Nivea in consistency which I’m fine with but won’t be using as my winter skin routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty heavy...but well-priced and very effective
reviews.reviewText: This stuff doesn't absorb into my skin as well as other brands...but it feels good and moisturizes very well. It's well-priced and has some really good ingredients. Overall I had to give it 5-stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As someone with chronically dry skin, this stuff is amazing. Rich and balmy but not heavy or greasy. This takes care of dry patches and really helps keep my moisture barrier intact. It's a small container. I wish it came in a larger quantity but a little goes a long way . Makes my skin smooth, soft, and hydrated. So far it has worked well with all my different makeup. I'm considering signing up for the subscription because it's so good and I don't want to be without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Feels very nice but is quite small
reviews.reviewText: Feels great on skin and makes skin feel softer but it's so small, that it runs out quicker than other skincare products despite using a small amount. Would recommend but probably only to buy when it's on offer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really excellent cream for dry skin and sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: Normally, I use very expensive products like Estée Lauder and Lancome, but I have been off work for two years because of surgery and cannot afford those at the moment so I ordered this cream and it is excellent! It’s very moisturizing and also protective and does not smell! Since my brain surgery, I have been sensitive to smell, so cannot use a lot of products, but this is a wonderful product. I am on my second jar. Do not hesitate to buy this wonderful cream at a great price!

reviews.reviewerName: It doesn't do what it shows on the ads it's just an average girdle.  It smooths but that's it it's not the magic you see on the ad.
reviews.reviewText: This has nice texture and smooths nicely into the skin. I've used it a week so far makes your skin smooth and silky.

I got the cream first but returned it because it didn’t feel like it absorbed into my skin. Or it just didn’t feel like it hydrated it. I have really dry and sensitive skin. Sometimes the texture of a product is just not that compatible. But then I found out it comes in a balm and I really like it so far.

I have extreme sensitive eyes that are always dry but this balm is the best for my issues. At first I was afraid it was going to be oily but it sinks in fairly quick. I do use on my face as well but it really help my eye issues. Small jar but a little goes a long way
